level.heading: Dissolution.
level.text: Except as otherwise provided in a contract or legacy transferring or loaning property to the Trust Fund, upon dissolution of the Trust Fund as a corporation, all remaining assets shall be transferred to the Mayor of the District of Columbia. The Mayor shall make every effort to use the assets for the prevention of child abuse and child neglect as provided in this subchapter.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary addition of subchapter, see notes to ยง 4-1341.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-56
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-56, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 4-1341.01.
